programme.title: Last Shoot Out
programme.desc: When newlywed Jocelyn learns that her husband, Jody, had her father shot, she flees in fear. While making her escape, she encounters gunman Billy Tyson, who safeguards her at a remote outpost as he staves off Jody's attempts to reclaim his bride.

programme.title: The Way of the West
programme.desc: Cattlemen find themselves at odds with sheep ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A Denver widow (Conchata Ferrell) with a daughter becomes a Scottish rancher's (Rip Torn) housekeeper in 1910 Wyoming.

programme.title: Montana Desperado
programme.desc: After the fourth tenant has been murdered on his ranch, Dave Borden is accused of the slayings but cleared. A neighboring rancher is also murdered by a mysterious masked rider, and his daughter Sally Wilson inherits his ranch.

programme.title: Canyon Ambush
programme.desc: A government agent (Johnny Mack Brown) searches for a masked rider and his murderous gang.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (John Wayne) and his friend Jake (George Hayes) have to keep two crooks away from their gold.

programme.title: The Man From Utah
programme.desc: A tough cowboy has a head-to-head confrontation with a gang of outlaws using a rodeo as its base of operations.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A potential mayoral candidate attempts to stir up trouble between majority and minority groups in town.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant that includes part of the Ponderosa; guest Sebastian Cabot.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A shepherd ignores the Cartwrights' warning not to drive his flock across the Ponderosa; guest Everett Sloane.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A Ponderosa ranch hand faces charges of killing the wife of the U.S. marshal (Claude Akins) who came to arrest him.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When a Ranger suddenly resigns without explanation, Rynning discovers that the man is hiding a secret.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: The wife of a preacher who recently established a mission for Apaches living near Gaheyville receives a suspicious telegram and fears her husband has been murdered; Travis learns the truth.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Cattle rustling leads to the cancellation of a contract to supply beef for railroad construction crews, and Matt Clark is called in to stop it.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Two criminals vow to fight the railroad when their homestead is threatened.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.sub-title: Murder on the Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Mesquite banker Calvin Drake plans to profit from Santa Fe Railroad by gaining control of all the land in the territory.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red carries Beth to shore after the stagecoach hits the water; Red and Beth capture Shark and bring him to the Mesquite jail.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Cherokee saves Red from certain death; Drake convinces the ranchers that the raids are over.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red derails a mining car before it can crush him; the henchmen escape with the rancher's money.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red escapes from the water tank hazard and orders the cowhands to start moving the cattle to the Lazy-W Ranch; Hanlon learns of this plan and prepares to stop them.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red, carrying Beth, reaches the safety of an overhanging ledge; Red moves the herd to the BAR-M Ranch; to raise money, Red organizes a Wells-Fargo stagecoach race.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red frees himself from the noose and barely beats the outlaw's stagecoach across the finish line, winning the $5000 prize.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red secures a confession from Grimes; Dade is trapped by Red and Cherokee in the act of destroying evidence.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red and Cherokee escape from the burning jail; Red learns that the Ryder ranch is about to be foreclosed by Drake's agents.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red barely escapes from the blast; in the aftermath of the explosion, he discovers papers linking Ace Hanlon to the raids on the ranchers.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: A rancher organizes an opposition to a crooked banker.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Sheriff Lawson wires for a Federal Land Commissioner to check on the various titles to land in the Mesquite district; One-Eye, under orders from Drake, attempts to halt the stagecoach and kill Treadway, the land agent.

programme.title: Texas City
programme.desc: Army gold shipments are being robbed and some insider is tipping off the outlaws as to the time and route. Johnny Mack Brown is called in and he teams up with Jim Kirby, an ex Army Officer who was kicked out when his shipment was robbed.

programme.title: Man From the Black Hills
programme.desc: Jim Fallon is summoned to Rim Rock by Hugh Delaney, an uncle he has not seen in years. Delaney wants to inform Jim that he has located Jim's elderly father, Pop Fallon, and that a young impostor has established himself as Pop's son.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: Kenny Rogers as the Gambler
programme.desc: An Old West poker player (Kenny Rogers) acquires a sidekick (Bruce Boxleitner) and sets out to help the son he never knew.
